properties.entry: SELECT COU_NO , COU_NAME , DISCOUNT , TO_CHAR(COU_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') COU_START , TO_CHAR(COU_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') COU_END , COU_CONDITION FROM TB_COUPON WHERE COU_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COU_NO DESC
UPDATE TB_COUPON SET COU_STATUS = 'N' WHERE COU_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_COUPON ( COU_NO , COU_NAME , DISCOUNT , COU_START , COU_END , COU_CONDITION ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
